RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNING FOR RAIN three wide, held. MIDNIGHT BISCUIT two path, couldnt catch. STREAK OF MUSIC tucked, rallied. FREAKIN PATRIOT DASH between, gaining. EL BEE DEE chased four path, faded. TEK NI COLOR four wide, no threat. ZOOMINGPRINCEZYDECO inside, weakened. UP TO GAME widest of all.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 6500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS DRIVE DA TRAIN fired, best. JRS MAJESTICS FIRST outdueled. I GOT FIRERY no troubles. BC MARY JEAUX JET false broke. TOASTIN CHAMPAGNE chased, no rally. TG COUP ZOOMS urged, empty. MATTHEWFIVESIXSEVEN failed to threaten. JETSET DIVA fractious in gate.

ENTRY.NAME: Jetset Diva
ENTRY.OWNER: Chaisson Kirt Blaine Petry Mark G and C 3 Development

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 220 Y Dirt CR: 83. Optional Claiming Purse 11700. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE DELIGHTFUL TEE despite being bumped. FREIGHTTRAIN GAME broke out, bumped, missed. CR EASE LOVE bid, no match late. TTT MORTANNA floated in early. DE TANYAS CARTEL pinched at break. AJKISS THIS CORONA forced out, squeezed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LETAL COWGIRL drifted, best in duel. JESS A WILD SHANNON just missed. JRS CORONAS QUEEN lost footing start. CCR COOK WAGON floated in, second flight duel. EN TREPEIN steadily faded. TEE ZARB floated inward. PER RULING #25277 FROM THE LOUISIANA HORSE RACING COMMISSION LETAL COWGIRL WAS DQD FOR A POSITIVE TEST

ENTRY.NAME: Jess a Wild Shannon
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Brian and Clay Johnnie Mae

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 400 Y Dirt CR: 88. Optional Claiming Purse 11700. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GT IS EARLS LEGACY dueled, best late. RUNAWAY LUCILLE never far from it. DL QUICK JOYRIDE always close. JRS CARTERS SHADOW clean trip, evenly. KING AIR trouble free trip outside. JRS MAGIC MAJESTIC in mix, faded. LUCI BLUE mild menace.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 220 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET JESSIE MAE AW strong late kick. MONROE TLC denied in duel. ITSACORONAYEAR bold bid. WAGON HIGH danced in gate. MP SHINING PERRY sharp start, weakened. ONE SOARING EAGLE close up, outkicked. ROGUE FROM THE SOUTH second flight duel. MS PISTOL PERRY no response. JJS DASHIN BOSTON in hunt, faded. FIRST IVORY ROSE lost path partway.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DYNASTY BLOOD floated in, well clear. CAUTIONARY TALES went to knees at start. MY CC DYNASTY drifted in and out. HO LOTTA EMOTION in tight partway. ONE TEMPTING JELLY urged, empty. TTT MARIA MARIA broke in sharply. MINT COOKIE CUTTER hard bump break. JODYS PIE no late kick. JTC SWITCHING LEADS latched rival. MJ DASHING EAGLE squeezed at start.
